metadata.dc:author: Rodríguez Rodrigo, F J
Alay, D
Pey, J
Terol, I
Rufilanchas, J J
metadata.dc:description: Clinical and angiographic features are described in a fifty-five years old man, with long-standing clinical manifestations of ischemic heart disease. In addition to severe coronary atherosclerosis, congenital atresia of the left main coronary was present. A description of the coronary anomaly found and a discussion of its meaning and significance are presented.
metadata.dc:title: Agenesia del tronco coronario izquierdo. Descripción de un caso y revisión de la bibliografía.
[Agenesis of the left coronary trunk. A case report and bibliographic review].
